channel.title: Should the staff add more rules to this board?
channel.description:
so here are some things i've seen in this model section so far and the topics have not been locked
[ul][li]Advertising, advertising different services, this should be what the models help section is for dammit![/li] [li]Recolors, Make your own damn models![/li] [li]stealing other people's models[/li] [li]Other stupid shit that has absolutely no business in this forum[/li][/ul]
and what the fuck do we do? let the moderators sit on their asses and make out with men. Why does no one care to use their staff positions and lock the damn things, so i say moparisthebest should add someone with modeling experience as a sectional mod, someone with no life who spends all day here modeling and flaming.
I do not give a fuck for these forums as i have my own (but my domain is down so i have nothing else to do). So please pay attention to this and fix it.
Here are some suggestions
Make a posting template (something that a user should use to post with) Any posts without pictures should be considered invalid Use a communist-like mentality and do not allow freedom on anything. Users should have to post with exact standards or receive a lock.
any other suggestions on what moderators should do?

item.title: Should the staff add more rules to this board?

I’ll skim through this section more often.

item.title: Should the staff add more rules to this board?
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

As said before, use the report to moderator button.
I think we only ever get reports from this section about once a month, those which are about a flame war that’s broken out, usually caused by a certain member or two…

Read full topic

item.title: Should the staff add more rules to this board?
item.dc:creator: @h1_sk1ller h1 sk1ller
item.description:
@h1_sk1ller wrote:

[quote=“Javafire, post:13, topic:374603”][quote author=h1 sk1ller link=topic=470566.msg3440963#msg3440963 date=1293077837]
Same for mine (SMF), I have an awesome domain too, www.artyarts.com
[/quote]
very nice, i can see it may have something to do with htaccess and your permissions, that and i bet your mysql databases are messed up. what kind of host are you paying to host this site?[/quote]

I found out XD, it was my hosting plan lol XD I’ll upgrade it soon

Read full topic

item.title: Should the staff add more rules to this board?
item.dc:creator: @Javafire Javafire
item.description:
@Javafire wrote:

Scape-JAVA:

Exactly, we try to have moderators at different times, it just doesn’t work out, but you see we’re always looking for new moderators, constantly.

hmm, you could form a punch in punch out timer, and any mod who doesn’t agree to that may have issues.

krackkid is a great mod for me on my site, and he does take it seriously enough to get shit done

Read full topic
item.source: Should the staff add more rules to this board?

item.source: Should the staff add more rules to this board?

item.title: Should the staff add more rules to this board?
item.dc:creator: @Javafire Javafire
item.description:
@Javafire wrote:

[quote=“Scape-JAVA, post:6, topic:374603”][quote author=Javafire link=topic=470566.msg3440935#msg3440935 date=1293076494]

If you send me a private message to those topics I’d happily delete them from the board! Don’t be afraid to use the report to a moderator button or even resort to private messaging me rule breaking topics! or hell even msn reporting is good too!

the thing is you need to be paying attention to them and not rely on any of these users to send you shit you probably wont respond to. it’s your responsibility not ours.
[/quote]

Infact, I respond to every report that is sent, I’ll drop what I’m doing and I’ll check the report and deal with it. And I do skim through sections every once in awhile. Guess what, there is a report to moderator button right under your post, you click it fill in the issue and when I have the time to check it I will, I have a life too. You can’t expect us to sit here 24/7 and not do anything but moderate the forum. It just doesn’t work like that. And if you see a rule breaking topic, it is your responsibility, your responsibility is to click that button and send the report so we, as moderators can solve the issue.[/quote]
well that’s what i’m trying to solve, get a mod without a life, there are plenty of people i know like that, and the staff should have assigned times aswell for a forum so big. I’m not picking a fight dude, especially with someone like you, a7x 4evr.

Read full topic
item.source: Should the staff add more rules to this board?

item.title: Should the staff add more rules to this board?
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

[quote=“Javafire, post:5, topic:374603”][quote author=Scape-JAVA link=topic=470566.msg3440924#msg3440924 date=1293076350]
If you send me a private message to those topics I’d happily delete them from the board! Don’t be afraid to use the report to a moderator button or even resort to private messaging me rule breaking topics! or hell even msn reporting is good too!
[/quote]
the thing is you need to be paying attention to them and not rely on any of these users to send you shit you probably wont respond to. it’s your responsibility not ours.[/quote]

Infact, I respond to every report that is sent, I’ll drop what I’m doing and I’ll check the report and deal with it. And I do skim through sections every once in awhile. Guess what, there is a report to moderator button right under your post, you click it fill in the issue and when I have the time to check it I will, I have a life too. You can’t expect us to sit here 24/7 and not do anything but moderate the forum. It just doesn’t work like that. And if you see a rule breaking topic, it is your responsibility, your responsibility is to click that button and send the report so we, as moderators can solve the issue.

Read full topic
item.source: Should the staff add more rules to this board?

the thing is you need to be paying attention to them and not rely on any of these users to send you shit you probably wont respond to. it’s your responsibility not ours.
